00056 #define TWO_OPERAND_TAC(x) ( (x->op >= ADD) && (x ->op <= SUB) )
00057 
00059 #define ASSIGN_TAC(x) ( (x->op == ASSIGN) )
00060 
00062 #define make_union(A,B,C)  set_union((A).begin(),(A).end(),(B).begin(),(B).end(),inserter((C),(C).begin() ))
00063 
00065 #define make_diff(A,B,C)  set_difference((A).begin(),(A).end(),(B).begin(),(B).end(),inserter((C),(C).begin() ))
00066 
00068 #define make_intersection(A,B,C)  set_intersection((A).begin(),(A).end(),(B).begin(),(B).end(),inserter((C),(C).begin() ))

00298 #define IS_RES_VALID(opr)  \
00299                   ( \
00300         ( opr == ADD ) || \
00301         ( opr == MUL ) || \
00302         ( opr == DIV ) || \
00303         ( opr == SUB ) || \
00304         ( opr == UMINUS ) || \
00305         ( opr == ADDR_OF ) ||\
00306         ( opr == R_INDEX_ASSIGN ) \
00307                   )
